title: Wood you buy a wooden case? - Fractal North
description: Save $25 with our offer code shortcircuit at   PC Case lover Plouffe is here to take a look at Fractal's newest case, the North, which has a unique feature... a wooden front panel! Does this case feel modern and sleek, or wood you be better off with a standard mesh look?  Check out Fractals cases:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Weird intro but ok 0:14 Unboxing 0:40 So many fan mounting options 1:11 Design impressions and top IO 1:50 Checking out the White with glass case 2:30 Taking all the panels off 4:21 Sponsor - Vessi 4:51 Building in the case 13:39 Completed build impressions 14:09 Overall thoughts 15:20 Outro
